titleStmt.title: A discourse vpon chyrurgery: written by that famous doctour and knight, Signior Leonardo Phiorauanti, Bolognese. VVith a declaration of many wonderfull matters necessary to be knowne; with most notable secret found out by the said authour. Translated out of Italian by Iohn Hester, and now newly published and augmented, for the benefite of this country: by Richard Booth, Gent
Cirugia. English
titleStmt.author: Fioravanti, Leonardo, 1518-1588.
Hester, John, d. 1593.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edward Allde dwelling neere vnto Chirst-Church [sic],

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Leonardo Phiorauanti, vpon chyrurgerie.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
